pack.name: CapeCode
pack.description: CapeCode: Ptolemy Actors for use with Accessors.

pack.name: Docs
pack.description: The documentation including user documentation and java documentation.

pack.name: JRE
pack.description: Java Runtime Environment (JRE) v1.8.0_51. This JRE includes JAI, Java 3D, Joystick, JMF, and Rxtx. Ptolemy II requires either a Java Runtime Environment (JRE) or Java Development Kit (JDK). Install the JRE if you want to use the included optional packages. Alternatively, install optionall packages by hand. If you plan on recompiling Ptolemy II, you will need a JDK, not a JRE.
